while <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G1162>also<s%>, with supplication on <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5228>behalf<s%>, long <S%G1971>after<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> by <S%G1223>reason<s%> of the <S%G5235>exceeding<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.
